thiefworld.main

Class ThiefWorldDisplayData

  • java.lang.Object
    • thiefworld.main.ThiefWorldDisplayData

  • public class ThiefWorldDisplayData
extends java.lang.Object
    Configures the visual elements that need to be displayed.
    Author:
    Stefan Adrian Boronea

      • ThiefWorldDisplayData

        public ThiefWorldDisplayData(boolean showChildren,
                     boolean showFruitSources,
                     boolean showGatherers,
                     boolean showHunters,
                     boolean showMeatSources,
                     boolean showNests,
                     boolean showPheromones,
                     boolean showProtectors,
                     boolean showThieves)
        Creates a new configuration for the simulation display.
        Parameters:
        showChildren - are children visible?
        showFruitSources - are fruit sources visible?
        showGatherers - are fruit gatherers visible?
        showHunters - are hunters visible?
        showMeatSources - are meat sources visible?
        showNests - are nests visible?
        showPheromones - are pheromones visible?
        showProtectors - are protectors visible?
        showThieves - are thieves visible?
